column1: Table 31. Percentage of wheat acreage receiving potash fertilizer, selected States
NA = Not available. Source data cover selected States in selected years; NA reflects State/crop/nutrient instances with no coverage.
1/  U.S. average is average of State's percent of acres receiving fertilizer, weighted by State's planted acres of winter, durum and spring wheat receiving fertilizer.
Source: Taylor (1964-93), NASS' Agricultural Chemical Usage (1994-2012).
